product_name: Eagle Creek USB World Travel Adapter
long_description: Because the world has all sorts of different configurations of wall outlets, the Eagle Creek USB World adapter gives you what you need to charge and use your electronics worldwide. USB World adapter includes 4 different plugs and works in over 150 countries, and it comes with a built-in USB charger. Includes plugs for the United Kingdom, Europe, United States and Australia. Universal receptor works with your appliances.
short_description: Because the world has all sorts of different configurations of wall outlets, the Eagle Creek USB World adapter gives you what you need to charge and use your electronics worldwide.
